TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A substance that is made by the body and used to store energy. It is being studied in the treatment of weight loss related to cancer. It is derived from the amino acid arginine.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Sustancia que el cuerpo elabora y usa para almacenar energía. Está en estudio para el tratamiento de la pérdida de peso relacionada con el cáncer. Es un derivado del aminoácido arginina.
